alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Passaic, southeastern Orange and Rockland Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vernon Valley, or 8 miles west of Warwick, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Warwick, Sloatsburg, Chester, Greenwood Lake, Pomona, Florida, Harriman, Upper Greenwood Lake, Kiryas Joel, Woodbury, Wesley Hills, New Hempstead, Pine Island and Tuxedo Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
